data.ocr:
REMEMBER WHEN THE INTERNET FIRST HEARD HEATH LEDGER WAS CAST AS THE JOKER?

I'm sorry Heath let's reminisce on the days of A Knight's Tale and Ten Things I Hate About You. Heath The Joker Bad casting. Bad joke. 
probably the worst casting of all time 
good job guys shoulda cast Crispin Glover as he was you know born to play the part 
 Heath Ledger Really I mean really now 
posted by JBean22 Health Ledger A joker I dont think so 
I am NOT seeing this movie if he is in it. Join Date Jul 2005 Location NYC There are over a million better choices they could have picked Posts 1220 someone off the street at random and made a better choice. Points 8373 T understand why they wouldn't have nicholson again (he stole the show Achievements last time but IMO the joker does that in every appearance he makes in @ the comics) I think the really appropriate choice would be mark hamill. Posted On 8072006 1244pm The voice of the joker is by far his best role and the one he was born to play. The cartoon joker (in batman and justice league) are far far more accurate (even if they are a bit less homicidal than they should be) than the movies have been Ledger just doesn't have what it takes. Please... No. The Joker is a character that needs an actor with gravity. Not some little twerp who got lucky.  

MAYBE WE CAN GIVE ROBERT PATTINSON A CHANCE AS BATMAN
data.title: Remove Twilight from his filmography and hes done some incredible work
